name: adcgen
description: CLI tool that generates HTML forms using Eleventy and GitHub Copilot

scripts.build: test -d _site_src && npx @11ty/eleventy || echo 'Skipping eleventy: _site_src not found'
scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p node_modules/.bin && ln -sf ../../bin/adcgen.js node_modules/.bin/adcgen && ln -sf ../../bin/adc.js node_modules/.bin/adc && ln -sf $(pwd)/bin/adcgen.js /usr/local/bin/adcgen 2>/dev/null && ln -sf $(pwd)/bin/adc.js /usr/local/bin/adc 2>/dev/null || true
